abstract: Jamie Dimon, chief executive of JPMorgan Chase, is broadly optimistic financial reform is headed in the right direction, he said on Monday at the Japan Society’s Annual Dinner in New York.
snippet: Jamie Dimon, chief executive of JPMorgan Chase, is broadly optimistic financial reform is headed in the right direction, he said on Monday at the Japan Society’s Annual Dinner in New York.
lead_paragraph: Jamie Dimon, chief executive of JPMorgan Chase, is broadly optimistic financial reform is headed in the right direction, he said on Monday at the Japan Society‘s Annual Dinner in New York.

headline.main: Dimon Broadly Optimistic on Financial Overhaul
